channel.title: [pi] my NPC's drop stuff 100% of the time?
channel.description:
okay so my NPC's are dropping items 100% of the time. I want them to drop stuff like every few kills with rare drops every so often. here's my npcdrops.tsm
[code]#Hobgoblin 122:45 995:50000 226:50 2366:1[/code]
hobgoblins drop either gold (item 995) or limpwurt roots (item 226) 100% of the time.. I want them to drop every like 2-3 kills. not every kill. it's the same with other npc's too. ive tried adjusting the number after npcid with no luck instead of 122:45, i've tried, 1, 15, 25, 75, 95.. no luck. it drops gold or limps every time. how do i change this? please help

item.title: [pi] my NPC's drop stuff 100% of the time?
item.dc:creator: @Noob_I_Own_U Noob I Own U
item.description:
@Noob_I_Own_U wrote:

Just found this on Google…

To solve your problem. Move every thing after the 122:45 onto the second line… then change the 45 to 2 or 3 this means that the items on the second line will be dropped 1/3 kills.

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] my NPC's drop stuff 100% of the time?
